message:
I want your feedback about my app "Tabe3". I don't know If this post is violating rules. If it is, please remove it.

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tabe3.news

Tabe3 - "Follow" in Arabic - is an Arabic news reader app that starts from where others end. 

It lets you follow latest news from various fields: politics, sports, technology, entrepreneurship, economy, women, cooking, cars, travel, tourism and economy.

Also you can follow latest news from various countries: Egypt, Saudi Arabia, UAE, Kuwait, Lebanon, Jordan, Bahrain, Oman, Yemen, Tunisia, Morocco, Algeria , Iraq , Sudan, Palestine, Qatar, Syria and Libya

Although it is in its first version, but it has a lot of competetive features. More Major features to come in coming updates

Current version features:

- Just follow your favorite sources. Choose from hundreds of available sources.

- No more Internet. Save a copy of the news and read it later without Internet.

- No more loss of preferences. Log in using Facebook or Twitter or email to save your preferences online, you still can use the application without login.

- You will receive a notification when there is breaking news from your favorite sources only. You can stop the notification feature.

- You can add a comment to the news.

- You can favorite news.

- You can share news with various social networks.

- You can search for news

- App is following latest Google tips & tricks in terms of beauty of user interface, ease of use, reducing Internet connection and saving battery.

App Page on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tabe3.news
Video for the app: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q8NQ_Ss4Kvs

Websites wrote reviews about app:
Ardroid: http://bit.ly/1XcVN8G
